intro: Nephradenia reflexa, commonly known as the reflexed nephradenia, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It belongs to the family Apiaceae, which includes many aromatic herbs and vegetables. The plant is characterized by its slender, upright stems and small, clustered white flowers. Its leaves are finely divided and have a delicate, fern-like appearance. Nephradenia reflexa is typically found in rocky or sandy soils and is often used in ornamental gardening due to its delicate beauty.
